mp:metadata.dc:title: Roman Widow
mp:metadata.dcterms:creator: Dante Gabriel Rossetti
mp:metadata.dc:subject: Preraphaelites, Widow, Roman Urn, Flowers, Lyre
http://id.loc.gov/authorities/subjects/sh85106390
http://id.loc.gov/authorities/subjects/sh85079175
http://id.loc.gov/authorities/subjects/sh85146612
http://id.loc.gov/authorities/subjects/sh88002472
mp:metadata.dc:description: Roman Widow is a painting by Gabriel Dante Rossetti depicting a roman woman, whose husband has died. His ashes are contained in the Urn in the background. The woman is sorrounded by floral garlands and carries a lyre.
mp:metadata.dc:publisher: Ponce (Porto Rico), Museo de Arte de Ponce, The Luis A. Ferré Foundation, Inc.
